# Preface {.unnumbered}

These notes are a personal undertaking as I look to develop a better working understanding of statistical inference.
Hence, they are written with my own mathematical background in mind.
Therefore they may not be suitable for study by readers hailing from mathematical backgrounds different from mine.

We assume, without further comment, that the reader is well-acquainted with the following:

* naive set theory;
* basic real analysis, especially metric spaces;
* measure theory.
